ModMetaData.name: AnimalHusbandry
ModMetaData.author: MightyGooga
ModMetaData.description:
V1.0 This is a mod that adds things to make farming animals more viable.For now it only adds a new recepie to make a stronger type of kibble.
Special Thanks to: - Flonz (Idea, Incentive, Coding, Playtesting, Texturing) - Sidfu (Support) - Kubouch (Universal Fermenter) - Cupropanda (Universal Fermenter) - NotFood (Support)
